message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. This is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,750, which is a good compromise.  This allows you to still get a good deal, while ensuring I can make a fair profit.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,200?
